definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Dian4 hua4 Dian4 bao4 Gong1 si1
Ri4 ben3 Dian4 bao4 Dian4 hua4 Gong1 si1

definition: International Telegraph and Telephone Consultative Committee (CCITT)
pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Dian4 bao4 Dian4 hua4 Zi1 xun2 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 国际电报电话咨询委员会

sentences.english: I cabled her, but we've been at sea.
sentences.chinese: 他打电报通知我他很快就会回来。

sentences.english: We were on the point of telephoning you when your telegram arrived.
sentences.chinese: 我们正准备给你打电话，这时你的电报来了。

sentences.english: I do not receive your message, please resend it to me.
sentences.chinese: 我没有收到你的电报，请重新发一份给我。

sentences.english: An urgent message was radioed to us this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上有条紧急消息以无线电报发给我们。

sentences.english: You will be charged commissions and telegraphic fees.
sentences.chinese: 您要付手续费和电报费。

sentences.english: I have sent a cable describing the wickedness of that infamous organization.
sentences.chinese: 我发了个电报，报道了那个臭名昭彰的组织的罪恶。

sentences.english: He wirelessed his mother on the way to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他在去日本的路上给他爸爸拍了电报。

sentences.english: I wonder if I can send cables without cash payment.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道是否可以不用现款拍发电报。

sentences.english: After succeeding in landing on George Island, the captain sent a radio message to his headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 胜利登上乔治岛后，船长向指挥部发了一份无线电报。

sentences.english: Send me a wire if I am needed urgently.
sentences.chinese: 项急需我请给我发电报。

sentences.english: You think you can get me to Telegraph Tower?
sentences.chinese: 你能带我去电报大楼吗？

sentences.english: But the characters who really intrigued me were the telegraph operators.
sentences.chinese: 不过令我大感兴趣的角色却是电报员。

sentences.english: Bain's device transmitted strictly black and white images.
sentences.chinese: 贝因的记录电报机传送严格意义上的黑白图像。

sentences.english: Please hurry up the dispatch of these telegrams.
sentences.chinese: 请赶快将这些电报发出去。

sentences.english: In writing telegrams, omit superfluous words .
sentences.chinese: 写电报稿要省去不必要的字。

definition: to reply to a telegram/to wire back
Military Commission of the Communist Party Central Committee/same as 軍委|军委
Wedemeyer (name)/Albert Coady Wedemeyer (1897-1989), US Army commander
